mapper.insert: insert into user(name, email, sns, reg_date, is_artist, profile_img, is_user_private, fcm_token, access_token) VALUES(#{name}, #{email}, #{sns}, #{reg_date}, #{is_artist}, #{profile_img}, #{is_user_private}, #{fcm_token}, #{access_token})
mapper.select: select * from user where access_token=#{access_token} and sns=#{sns}
mapper.update: update user SET name=#{name}, email=#{email}, is_artist=#{is_artist}, profile_img=#{profile_img}, is_user_private=#{is_user_private}, fcm_token=#{fcm_token} WHERE user_no=#{user_no}
